add.title: Cantonal Authorization
add.description: Proof that the employer has obtained authorization from the Cantonal Migration Office.

steps_flow.title: Employer Applies
steps_flow.description: Employer submits application to the Cantonal employment authority.

steps_flow.title: Cantonal & Federal Approval
steps_flow.description: Application is reviewed by Canton and SEM (State Secretariat for Migration).

steps_flow.title: Authorization Issued
steps_flow.description: Employer receives the authorization and forwards it to you.

steps_flow.title: Visa Application
steps_flow.description: Submit passport and authorization to the Swiss Consulate/VFS for visa stamping.
